definitions.definition: ( transitive ) To enfold ; to hold as in one's lap; to cherish .
( transitive ) To rest or recline in someone's lap, or as in a lap.

main_definition: ( transitive ) To enfold ; to hold as in one's lap; to cherish .
secondary_definitions: ( transitive ) To rest or recline in someone's lap, or as in a lap.

definitions.definition: ( transitive ) To fold; to bend and lay over or on something.
examples: to lap a piece of cloth

definitions.definition: ( transitive ) to wrap around, enwrap , wrap up
examples: to lap a bandage around a finger

definitions.definition: ( transitive ) To place or lay (one thing) so as to overlap another.
examples: One laps roof tiles so that water can run off.

definitions.definition: ( transitive ) To polish (a surface, especially metal or gemstone) with very fine abrasive to achieve smoothness and small dimensional changes.
( intransitive ) To be turned or folded; to lie partly on or over something; to overlap .
examples: The boats lap ; the edges lap .

definitions.definition: ( transitive , sports , motor racing ) To overtake a straggler in a race by completing one more whole lap than the straggler.
To cut or polish with a lap, as glass, gems, cutlery, etc.

main_definition: ( transitive ) To fold; to bend and lay over or on something.
secondary_definitions: ( transitive ) to wrap around, enwrap , wrap up
( transitive ) To place or lay (one thing) so as to overlap another.
( transitive ) To polish (a surface, especially metal or gemstone) with very fine abrasive to achieve smoothness and small dimensional changes.
( intransitive ) To be turned or folded; to lie partly on or over something; to overlap .
( transitive , sports , motor racing ) To overtake a straggler in a race by completing one more whole lap than the straggler.
To cut or polish with a lap, as glass, gems, cutlery, etc.

definitions.definition: To take (liquid) into the mouth with the tongue; to lick up with a quick motion of the tongue.
examples: Don’t lap your soup like that! You look like a dog.

definitions.definition: To wash against a surface with a splashing sound; to swash .

main_definition: ( ambitransitive ) To take (liquid) into the mouth with the tongue; to lick up with a quick motion of the tongue.
secondary_definitions: ( intransitive , of water ) To wash against a surface with a splashing sound; to swash .
